competitions.description: Hackathon held in Instituto Tecnológico y de Estudios Superiores de Monterrey, Campus Monterrey. My team participated in the Konfío and JDA (now BlueYonder) challenge regarding clearer and smarter income/expenses dashboards and machine learning predictions respectivelly. My team won first place for the latter and got invited to their offices in Monterrey and Arizona

We developed an appp featuring the store's mascot that served as an AR virtual assistant while shopping.
